Subclass/Dual Class Master Raina:
So you have not yet completed their quest "Mimir's Elixir".
Need for creating subclass perform a quest "Mimir's Elixir". To learn about the quest, visit Magister Ladd in Ivory Tower of Oren.
If you belong to the race of Kamael, you must be completed "Mimir's Elixir", but "Seed of Chaos". To learn the details of this quest, go to the Kekropus to Museum of Talking Island.
To begin the quest "Mimir's Elixir", we must first do the quest "Fate's Whisper". It can be obtained from Maestro Reorin, who lives in a hut on the east of Oren.
